encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: The Aesthetics of Hexameter Verses: A New Fragment on Metre in the Michigan Collection.

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 6766a verso is characterized in the library's inventory as "grammatical treatise". Fr. 3 focuses on metre rather than prosody or grammar in the strict sense. Homeric verses are quoted. Frs. 1 and 2 will be edited elsewhere. Unknown provenance, II century C.E.
